title: Footer rebuild to match screenshot layout (beige/black theme)

requirements.summary: Rebuild Footer to match screenshot: 3 columns (brand/description, Quick Links, About paragraph) plus a single centered copyright line, keeping beige/black theme tokens.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer uses a 3-column layout on desktop and stacks cleanly on mobile (brand/description, quick links, about).
Middle column contains link items: Buy, Sell, Rent, Lost & Found and routes to /buy, /sell, /rent, /lost-found.
Right column shows an About paragraph (not just a single 'About Us' link) using the project name (UniXange) in the text.
Bottom area shows only: “© {currentYear} UniXange. All Rights Reserved.” centered (or visually matching the screenshot), and removes the “Built with … caffeine.ai” line.
Overall colors remain consistent with the app’s beige/black theme (no new color scheme introduced), using existing Tailwind tokens (e.g., bg-background/bg-card, text-foreground, muted-foreground).

file_operations.description: Replace current 4-section footer with a 3-column layout matching the screenshot: left brand name + short description, middle 'Quick Links' list linking to /buy, /sell, /rent, /lost-found, right 'About' heading + paragraph mentioning UniXange; update spacing/typography to visually match screenshot; remove the Heart icon import and the caffeine.ai credit line; ensure bottom bar contains only the centered “© {currentYear} UniXange. All Rights Reserved.” line and uses existing theme tokens (bg-card/bg-background, text-foreground/muted-foreground) without introducing new colors.

requirements.summary: Keep footer integrated in the global layout and ensure build succeeds without changing routing/auth logic or immutable files.
acceptanceCriteria: No changes are made to backend canister code.
No changes are made to immutable hook files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Footer renders on all pages as before (via App layout), with no runtime errors or broken links.
Project compiles without TypeScript or lint errors related to the footer changes.

file_operations.description: Verify Footer remains rendered in the global Layout on all routes (keep it after <main>), with no changes to routing/auth logic; limit changes to non-functional adjustments only (if any) needed to preserve global integration after Footer refactor.

Double-check Footer changes do not introduce TypeScript errors (e.g., unused imports), and that TanStack Router <Link> usage is correct for /buy, /sell, /rent, /lost-found; ensure no references to immutable hook/UI files are added or modified.
